member.name: T:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Board
member.summary: Represents a Flow topic page.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Board.#ctor(WikiClientLibrary.Sites.WikiSite,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance from MW site and board page title.
member.param: MediaWiki site.
Full page title of the Flow discussion board, including namespace prefix.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Board.EnumTopicsAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously enumerates the topics in the order of time posted in this board.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Board.EnumTopicsAsync(WikiClientLibrary.Flow.TopicListingOptions)
member.summary: Asynchronously enumerates the topics in this board.
member.param: Enumeration options.
How many topics should be fetched in batch per MediaWiki API request. No more than 100 (100 for bots) is allowed.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Board.EnumTopicsAsync(WikiClientLibrary.Flow.TopicListingOptions,System.Int32)
member.summary: Asynchronously enumerates the topics in this board.
member.param: Enumeration options.
How many topics should be fetched in batch per MediaWiki API request. No more than 100 (100 for bots) is allowed.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Board.HeaderContent
member.summary: Header content.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Board.HeaderRevision
member.summary: Latest header content revision.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Board.NewTopicAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new topic on the current board.
member.param: Title of the new topic, in wikitext format.
First post content of the new topic, in wikitext format.
The token used to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task that returns the newly-created topic when succeeds. The instance only contains the workflow ID, so you may need to call if you want to query more information about it.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Board.NewTopicAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new topic on the current board.
member.param: Title of the new topic, in wikitext format.
First post content of the new topic, in wikitext format.
The token used to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task that returns the newly-created topic when succeeds. The instance only contains the workflow ID, so you may need to call if you want to query more information about it.

member.summary: Fetches board header information from server.

member.summary: Fetches board header information from server.

member.summary: Full title of the board page.

member.name: T:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision
member.summary: Contains the revision information with content of Flow board headers or topic posts.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.Actions
member.summary: HTML links to show operations.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.ArticleTitle
member.summary: Full title of the page containing this revision.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.Author
member.summary: Author of the post or header.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.Content
member.summary: Revision content, in wikitext format. Depending on the context, this can be the topic content, topic summary, or post content.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.ContentLength
member.summary: Content length, in bytes.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.IsLocked
member.summary: Determines whether the post has been locked (i.e. discussion closed).

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.IsModerated
member.summary: Determines whether the post has been moderated (hidden).

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.IsModeratedNotLocked
member.summary: Determines whether the post has been moderated but not locked.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.LastEditId
member.summary: Revision ID of the last edit.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.LastEditUser
member.summary: Last editor of the post or header.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.LastUpdated
member.summary: For topic revision, the last update time of the whole topic, including replies, changes to topic title, content, or replies.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.Links
member.summary: HTML links to show different views.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.OldContentLength
member.summary: Content length before this revision, in bytes.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.PreviousRevisionId
member.summary: Revision ID of the previous revision.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.ReplyIds
member.summary: Workflow ID of the replies.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.ReplyToId
member.summary: Workflow ID of the post this revision replies to.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.RevisionId
member.summary: Flow revision ID.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.Summary
member.summary: For topic title revision, this is the latest revision of topic summary, if available.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.TimeStamp
member.summary: The time stamp of the revision.

member.name: P:WikiClientLibrary.Flow.Revision.WorkflowId
member.summary: Workflow ID of the revision. For board header, this is the workflow ID of the board; for topic posts, this is the topic ID.

member.summary: Use user's default sorting preference.
